attributes.review: if you want an app that will erase all the data on your phone but somehow still know to set notifications every five minutes that alert you at the highest volume even when your phone is on silent, this is the app for you. if you want an app that will remind your ex wife why she left you every six hours, this app will do it for you free of charge.
attributes.title: do NOT download this

attributes.review: When I opened this app it tracked my location and sent a member of the secret service to break into my house in the middle of the night. 👮🏻‍♂️❌After bashing in my door with an orange battery ram 🍊😡, the agent  attacked my dog Bernie 🐶 , screamed “VIVA LA CHEETO” 🤬, spray painted a blood red pentagram one the wall in which he sacrificed several chickens in 🐓💀😈, and then committed arson in the first degree by burning my house down 🔥🏚Would not recommend 😰🤪
attributes.title: This app hired the secret service to kill my dog

attributes.review: As much as I love and cherish our president, mr Cheeto, this app is a disgrace on his name. For the amount of money in bunker boys wallet you would think he would create a good app but unfortunately I was wrong. Not only is all the information false, but wildly homophobic, racist, sexist, and just plain out hateful. Hopefully we can come together as a nation and finally realize, if he can’t make an app, he can’t run a country.
attributes.title: Wow such a disappointment.

attributes.review: This app took many days to load and the subscription is $10,000 a month and it has not been updated till it came out there is nothing but ads and pictures of trump there’s nothing to do on this app do not buy it it is a waste of time and money there is many things you can only get with money even trumpies hate this app
attributes.title: The worst app ever

attributes.review: my and my ex step daughters half brother and his mom have never been so offended. as we all identify as bottled fluid antibody germ filled armandos. we came to see nothing that showed our velociraptor how to speak. this angered our germs so much we walked to the farthest taco bell. and still no chicken sandwiches. so i had my neighbor walk my chicken before sunset at midnight. we got back to eat BED SHEETS for dinner and road our dishes up the roof in the basement
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: do NOT download this app....i got it thinking it would help with my dogs anger issues but instead my dog turned into a elephant and crushed my entire house !!! i tried using a rope to drag my now pet elephant out of the house but she turned into a dinosaur and ate me.....not to mention she glitches and changes animals every five seconds and is started to turn into food objects....i worry she is turning into an orange like bunker boy 🙈🙈
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I was completely and utterly 👹disappointed with this app! WHY👿 is this putrid orange Cheeto 🤢 being plastered 👁👅👁across my screen 😡😡😡!!! This app was so bland! ✨No nicki feature✨🙈, No comedic relief and the lack of Iconic figures! 😞..... and let’s not forget to mention😖 the amount of viruses and bugs🐜 that I got due to this 😤app it’s almost as if they could tell that I wasn’t a straight white👱🏼‍♂️ male!!!! 😔✨. Don’t waste your time with this Tom foolery!!😜✌🏼
attributes.title: No ❤️

attributes.review: This is a cancerous app!!!!! Horrible experience, I opened the app and saw bunker boy one too many times... I only could take so much. If you do decide to download, do it AT YOUR OWN RISK! I speak for the thousands of other intelligent people who left low reviews when i say I want this app gone immediately! It’s an app that promotes hate speech, pedophiles, r@pists and racists!!! Is that what the internet has come to?? So disappointed.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE!!!!!!!

attributes.review: this app gave my phone so many glitches,it’s worser than the iOS 14 update,Right when I opens this app I had to go to the ER because I had a stroke looking at it🧚🏼‍♀️✨.Dont ever download this app it deserves to be DELETEDDD💅🏽✨AND also I am Mexican and proud OFFFFF BEING MEXICAN.😘Black lives MATTER TOO!we are unstoppable💆🏽‍♀️.talking bout “make America great again”HES MAKING IT WOSERRRRRRRRRRR AND MAKE PPL SUFFER MORE.i don’t recommend downloading this app✨🧚🏼‍♀️😒Gen z 2020😌🥳! now take this app down 🥰
attributes.title: horrible app✨

attributes.review: So my pet peewee is a chiquaua or whatever, and it detected my dog and said, I’m sorry but I’m going to have to deport your dog because he is Mexican. Peewee ain’t done nothing wrong, he likes to eat his chicken and vibe, any ways, lovely peaches BARGES TO MY DOOR, AANNDDD demanded me to give her peewee, I obviously say no because she lost custody of her girl, but she started doing the THINGSSS!!! I’m so terrified and please don’t use this app, it will follow u and peaches will steal ur peewee. Please don’t get the app!!!!
attributes.title: Peewee
